title: i've bought items and have'd received them
body: i bought three critical damage items from the three lower class color runes one from each three in total and i have'd received two of the runes can u help with my most recent IP points buy tier 3

replies.body: After looking at your purchase history and list of runes, it does look like you received all of those critical damage runes. You bought one glyph, seal, and mark, and you should be able to find them in your rune pages. If not, grab a screenshot and post it here for me.
